law.catch_line: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this sec...

text.section: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this section.
The applicant shall be of good character and reputation.
An applicant for a license to practice land surveying shall meet the educational and experience requirements under § 15-305 of this subtitle.
Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, an applicant shall pass each examination required under this subtitle.
